specialRules.hint: Friendly units using Ambush may ignore distance restrictions from enemies if within 12” of the hero.
specialRules.name: Celestial Beacon
specialRules.label: Celestial Beacon
specialRules.description: Friendly units using Ambush may ignore distance restrictions from enemies if within 12” of the hero.

specialRules.hint: When this this model fights in melee pick one of the following stances and apply the bonus: • Offensive: AP(+1).
specialRules.name: Combat Stance
specialRules.label: Combat Stance
specialRules.description: When this this model fights in melee pick one of the following stances and apply the bonus: • Offensive: AP(+1).

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”. Roll one die, on a 4+ it may immediately move by up to 6”.
specialRules.name: Herald Horn
specialRules.label: Herald Horn
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”. Roll one die, on a 4+ it may immediately move by up to 6”.

specialRules.hint: Enemy units can’t be set up within 18” of this unit when using Ambush.
specialRules.name: Howl
specialRules.label: Howl
specialRules.description: Enemy units can’t be set up within 18” of this unit when using Ambush.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one friendly Artillery unit within 6”, which may either get +2 to its shooting rolls or move up to 6” during its next activation.
specialRules.name: Order Engineer
specialRules.label: Order Engineer
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one friendly Artillery unit within 6”, which may either get +2 to its shooting rolls or move up to 6” during its next activation.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get +1 to their melee attack rolls.
specialRules.name: Relic Banner
specialRules.label: Relic Banner
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get +1 to their melee attack rolls.

spells.name: Terrify
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Thunder
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Star Chains
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 18” moves -6” next time it charges.

spells.name: Lightning
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).

spells.name: Shock Speed
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Storm
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 8 automatic hits each.
